segment.source: Windows Performance Recorder (WPR) recording profiles are stored in an XML file that has a .wprp extension.
segment.target: Windows Performance Recorder (WPR) recording profiles are stored in an XML file that has a .wprp extension.

segment.source: Profile definitions bring together the collector and provider definitions in the .wprp file.
segment.target: Profile definitions bring together the collector and provider definitions in the .wprp file.

segment.source: The Strict attribute in provider definitions controls the behavior of a recording profile when the provider does not start at the same time that the recording starts.
segment.target: The Strict attribute in provider definitions controls the behavior of a recording profile when the provider does not start at the same time that the recording starts.

segment.source: Providers might not start for many reasons, such as a bug in the provider implementation or an incorrectly configured system.
segment.target: Providers might not start for many reasons, such as a bug in the provider implementation or an incorrectly configured system.

segment.source: When a provider does not start and its Strict attribute is set to "true", the start operation fails and rolls back.
segment.target: When a provider does not start and its Strict attribute is set to "true", the start operation fails and rolls back.

segment.source: All collectors and providers that started successfully are canceled.
segment.target: All collectors and providers that started successfully are canceled.

segment.source: The error log provides error information about the provider that did not start.
segment.target: The error log provides error information about the provider that did not start.

segment.source: If the Strict attribute is set to "false", as many collectors and providers start as is possible, and the start operation succeeds.
segment.target: If the Strict attribute is set to "false", as many collectors and providers start as is possible, and the start operation succeeds.

segment.source: Information about providers that did not start appears as warnings instead of errors.
segment.target: Information about providers that did not start appears as warnings instead of errors.
